domain.description: The actual domain or sub-domain. e.g. www.hubspot.com

id.description: The unique ID of this domain.

isResolving.description: Whether the DNS for this domain is optimally configured for use with HubSpot.

isUsedForBlogPost.description: Whether the domain is used for CMS blog posts.

isUsedForEmail.description: Whether the domain is used for CMS email web pages.

isUsedForKnowledge.description: Whether the domain is used for CMS knowledge pages.

isUsedForLandingPage.description: Whether the domain is used for CMS landing pages.

isUsedForSitePage.description: Whether the domain is used for CMS site pages.
